name: Michael M.
longTestimonial: Jerry, I wanted to let you know that the paintings have arrived, been inspected, and everything is in tip-top shape. My friend sent me pictures of the packing and the artwork. Everything looks wonderful.  Thanks so much for your excellent service and prompt response. I will see the art in person in October and make that video for you.
shortTestimonial: I wanted to let you know that the paintings have arrived, been inspected, and everything is in tip-top shape.
